DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess effect ketorolac premedication effectiveness inferior alveolar nerve block , pretreatment postoperative pain patient symptomatic irreversible pulpitis .
DOC.brief_title: Ketorolac Premedication Anesthetic Efficiency IANB & Postendodontic Pain Teeth With Irreversible Pulpitis
DOC.detailed_description: - Patients clinically radiographically examine eligibility assess preoperative pain measure . Eligible patient treat one visit . - Patients randomly assign one 2 group : experimental group ( take 10 mg tablet ketorolac ) control group ( take placebo tablet ) . Each tablet take one hour start treatment . The patient 's pain assess local anesthetic adminstration . After 15 minute initial inferior alveolar nerve block ( IANB ) , teeth examine use cold pulp sensitivity test ; case mild pain , treatment initiate . - During root canal treatment , mild pain response consider success . In case failure , supplemental anesthesia administrate . - Postoperative pain assess 6 , 12 , 24 48 hour treatment . The number patient require rescue analgesic medication within 48 hour postoperatively count .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1845 year old . 2 . Males Females . 3 . Mandibular Posterior teeth symptomatic irreversible pulpitis . 4 . Patients noncontributory systemic condition . 1 . Patients allergic analgesic antibiotic anesthetic 2 . Pregnant females 3 . If analgesic administrate past 8 hour endodontic treatment . 4 . Irrestorable teeth .
